rooms.description: Provides an inviting entrance with Vastu alignment for positive energy flow.
Spacious room designed in Kerala style with traditional wooden elements and central courtyard view.
Adjacent to the living area for family meals and gatherings.
Efficiently designed kitchen with modern amenities integrated with Kerala-style aesthetics.
Well-ventilated bathroom ensuring privacy and functionality.
Guest room with Kerala-style decor and natural lighting.
Second guest room, complementing the first, maintaining symmetry in design.
Dedicated home office space with Vastu-aligned placement for productivity and privacy.

openings.description: Main entrance connecting to the living room, ensuring energy flow as per Vastu.
Large windows for ample natural light with a view of the central courtyard and garden.
Door leading to an outdoor kitchen area adjacent to the central courtyard for fresh air circulation.
Small ventilation window ensuring proper airflow in the bathroom.
Door connecting the home office to a private study area or storage, designed with privacy in mind.
